actions.message: Welcome ${tempVars("newmem")}! I'm Easy Moderation but you can call me Alan. I was made by Ollie#0196 `<@534479985855954965>` but I also help out on this server so if you need any help, just ask! You can get help by saying `+help {what you need help with}`. Once again, thanks for joining and welcome to the server!
